greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = sum(2i+3j=n, 0<=i<=n, 0<=j<=n, n!/((2i)!(3j)!)).
comment: Average of binomial and inverse binomial transform of 1,0,0,1,0,0,1,... - _Paul Barry_, Jan 04 2005
maple: A094715_list := proc(n) local i; (exp(z)+2*exp(-z/2)*cos(z*sqrt(3/4)))*cosh(z)/3;  series(%,z,n+2): seq(i!*coeff(%,z,i),i=0..n) end: A094715_list(34); # _Peter Luschny_, Jul 10 2012
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, May 23 2004
